chat_history.message:
Hello, I have an issue with my iPhone 12 product. The device becomes hot after some time of use and then turns off and on multiple times. Additionally, the screen may display a purple pixelated image. It only starts working normally again after the device has been turned off for a longer period.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>repair<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the repair. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Jorge Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are currently processing the device.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

please provide us tracking link during the morning, otherwise i will have to refund the customer.


Regards,
Jorge from the Back Care Team

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist mit Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

unlock code is: 246801

Regards,
Jorge from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the unlock code. Can I confirm if the customer had dropped the device during use? This information determines whether the device is still under warranty. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

No drop and no fall.

Regards,
Jorge from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We will continue processing the device. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for 29.05.24. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 11.06.24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Ermelinda from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We will continue processing the device. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

You have received the product for repair. The deadline for the repair is 3 working days.
As you have not complied with this deadline, we will refund the purchase price to the customer. 

Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team
